channel.title: How do you add a welcome screen? HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
Hi, I just want to know :confused:how you make a Welcome Screen :confused:, Please answer as soon as possible thx!
:) :)
I have seen slot of servers that when you log in you have like a screen saying (server name)at the top and a close button to the right and server created by (ownersname)And then near the bottem it says Updates forums and stuff like that
When on this on start up you can not walk any where you can see your character ect ect
Please help and give me a code
__________________________________________________-

item.title: How do you add a welcome screen? HELP PLEASE
